judgment.error: Order not uploaded by concerned court

business_details.Business: Accused is present. By filing petition 1478/18 accused Abdul Barek @ Barek Ali submitted he preferred application u/s 482 Cr.P.C for quashing the case  and Hon&amp#039ble High Court has passed an order dated 20-08-18 to stay the further proceeding of the case  and he had enclosed the order dated 20-08-18 of Hon&amp#039ble High Court. I have perused the order dated 20-08-18 passed by Hon&amp#039ble High Court by which the further proceeding of Special Case No. 19/2017, arising out of Bilasipara PS Case No. 794/17 u/s 4 of POCSO Act is stayed. Accordingly in compliance of order dated 20-08-18 passed by Hon&amp#039ble High Court, further proceeding of this case is  hereby stayed. In view of this stay by the Hon&amp#039ble High Court, the IO present before the court is not examine and discharged.
